## ğŸ¯ INTEGRATED TESTING PLAN:

**Once you deploy, we'll test:**
1. **Page Tracking:** Visit test.tangotiempo.com/calendar

2. **MapCenter Tracking:** Log in to TEST, change map center
   - Verify MapCenter endpoint receives data
   - Check MongoDB MapCenterHistory collection
   - Confirm IP tracking in all collections

3. **End-to-End Flow:**
   - Frontend sends tracking data âœ… (my side ready)
   - Backend receives and stores â³ (your side pending)
